import React from 'react' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button' import Dialog from '@material-ui/core/Dialog' import DialogActions from '@material-ui/core/DialogActions' import DialogContent from '@material-ui/core/DialogContent' import DialogContentText from '@material-ui/core/DialogContentText' import DialogTitle from '@material-ui/core/DialogTitle' import useMediaQuery from '@material-ui/core/useMediaQuery' import { useTheme } from '@material-ui/core/styles' export default function ResponsiveDialog() { const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false) const theme = useTheme() const fullScreen = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.down('sm')) function handleClickOpen() { setOpen(true) } function handleClose() { setOpen(false) } return (
{"Use Google's location service?"} Let Google help apps determine location. This means sending anonymous location data to Google, even when no apps are running.
) }
